Pre-Game Insights: Australia had a horrid start to their campaign with a six-wicket loss against India.
South Africa has grown into confidence with their recent ODI results over the last month.
The Proteas batting has been in incredible form with the likes of Aiden Markram, Henrich Klassen and Rassie van der Dussen scoring a lot of runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow has produced often produced spin-friendly tracks with an average score of 210.
Batting second on this ground could be slightly easier if the dew factor comes into play.
Australia lost against India in Chennai.
South Africa won their opening match against Sri Lanka.
